PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-08482009-05-28,  ,  ,  F&O,  , 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Metal Mining Effluent Regulations.
PrecisExpanding the scope of application of the MMER to include certain hydrometallurgical facilities by amending the definitions of mine, operations area and effluent; defining hydrometallurgy and hydrometallurgical facility effluent; and adding Sandy Pond to Schedule 2 of the MMER.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0156 Publication Date: 2009-06-10
AttachmentsAttachment
